Definition at line 286 of file pizSequence.c.

PIZError pizSequenceSetScale ( PIZSequence *  x,
PIZScaleKey  key,
PIZScaleType  type,
const PIZGrowingArray *  a 
)

Set the scale of the sequence.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
key The scale key.
type The scale type.
a The scale if the type provided is custom, otherwise should be NULL.
Remarks:
An example : 
  if (type != PIZ_SCALE_CUSTOM) {
      pizSequenceSetScale (sequence, PIZ_KEY_C, PIZ_DORIAN, NULL);
  } else {
      pizSequenceSetScale (sequence, PIZ_KEY_C, PIZ_SCALE_CUSTOM, growingArrayPtr);
  }
Warning:
Custom scales must be twelve values long.
